firstSection.title: Hi, I'm
firstSection.subtitle: Developer focused on creative and high-performance solutions.

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about creating digital experiences that connect people and businesses. I have hands-on experience developing online stores, system integrations, automation, and optimizing online sales processes. I always strive for scalable, clean, and efficient solutions, prioritizing performance and user experience.
